[invenio_access.actions]
holdingpen_admin_access = invenio_workflows_ui.permissions:action_admin_access
holdingpen_read_access = invenio_workflows_ui.permissions:action_read_access
holdingpen_write_access = invenio_workflows_ui.permissions:action_write_access

[invenio_base.api_apps]
invenio_workflows_ui = invenio_workflows_ui:InvenioWorkflowsUIREST

[invenio_base.apps]
invenio_workflows_ui = invenio_workflows_ui:InvenioWorkflowsUI

[invenio_celery.tasks]
invenio_workflows_ui = invenio_workflows_ui.tasks
